item.description:
Dear Beerunchers and Munchers,

We have decided to keep things simple and have our brunch in roughly the same location as the original. We'll be going to the Cambridge Brewing Company, also in the complex at 1 Kendall Square, accessable from 20 Hampshire Street.

Note the time change; we'll be starting at 11:30 rather than 11:00. Although Cambridge Brewing Company has a smaller brunch menu than the Friendly Toast, they still serve the staples, as well as a pretty nice lunch menu and lots of beers.


See you all on Saturday at Cambridge Brewing Company!

Nora
item.how_to_find_us: Big table reserved under Nora Delaney
item.name: Atheist Easter Brunch at Cambridge Brewing Company
